ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 30. West wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

state.message: Sorry we're currently closed but we will be open next Sunday from 12 - 5PM and Monday from 7 - 10PM. Check us out on Facebook.
state.preMessage: In memory of Nicholas Lordi, who passed away on Nov 4th. Nick was a supporter of the Information Age Learning Center (InfoAge) and and the IXR/CDL makerspace. His family asks that if you are so moved, you make a donation to support the expanded Makerspace program at InfoAge..
state.postMessage: To get current updates subscribe to our CDL Mail list or cdl+subscribe@groups.io.
state.blogUpdate: (Title: Makerspace near me ... Can't find CDL - Updated: Oct. 05, 2022)

events.name: Git push
